attributes.action: urgently reform rules on MPs' expenses, hiring of family members, outside earnings, attendance, and setting salaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We demand:
1.NO MORE 2ND HOMES - STOP MPs buying second homes with taxpayers money, and selling them and pocketing the profit
2.NO MORE NEPOTISM - STOP MPs hiring family members as paid staff
3.NO MORE MOONLIGHTING - STOP MPs doing second jobs when I'm paying for them to be my full-time MP
4.NO MORE TRUANTING - STOP MPs being allowed to turn up to work when they feel like it
5.NO MORE MAKING YOUR OWN RULES - STOP MPs voting their own salaries and setting their own expenses rules

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
